Project.name: PureMVC Standard for JavaScript
Project.Description: PureMVC is a lightweight framework for creating applications based upon the classic Model-View-Controller design meta-pattern. This is the specific implementation for the JavaScript language. See the Release Notes for this version for differences from the reference implementation.
Project.ReleaseNotes: Features in 1.0 * Fully-functional port of the PureMVC AS3 Standard Reference Version. * Employee Admin demo fully reproduced.
Project.Installation: Installing the Project Source Code From the archive * Download the latest source code archive. * Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk. For instance: c:\development\ * You will see a PureMVC_JS_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder. For instance: c:\development\PureMVC_JS_X_Y From the Repository * Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
